description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共北京市委书记、北京市市长、冶金工业部部长。中共第十六、十七届中央政治局委员。
description.en: A political figure in the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as the Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee, Mayor of Beijing, and Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry. He was a member of the 16th and 17th Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，刘淇的前任中共北京市委书记及北京市市长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure and the predecessor of Liu Qi as both the Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee and the Mayor of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，刘淇的继任中共北京市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure and the successor of Liu Qi as the Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，刘淇的继任北京市市长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure and the successor of Liu Qi as the Mayor of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，刘淇的前任中华人民共和国冶金工业部部长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure and the predecessor of Liu Qi as the Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院总理，主持1998年国务院机构改革。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Premier of the State Council and presided over the 1998 institutional reform of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 国际奥委会前主席，曾向刘淇颁授奥林匹克金质勋章。
description.en: Former President of the International Olympic Committee who awarded the Olympic Order in Gold to Liu Qi.

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在北京市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市的最高地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest local state administrative organ of Beijing, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的组成部门，负责管理冶金工业。于1998年国务院机构改革中被撤销。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the administration of the metallurgical industry. It was abolished during the 1998 institutional reform of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京市的一所中学，刘淇的母校。
description.en: A middle school in Beijing, the alma mater of Liu Qi.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京市的一所大学，刘淇的母校。
description.en: A university in Beijing, the alma mater of Liu Qi.

description.zh-cn: 位于湖北省武汉市的特大型钢铁联合企业，刘淇曾在此长期工作并担任经理。
description.en: A large-scale iron and steel complex located in Wuhan, Hubei Province, where Liu Qi worked for a long time and served as manager.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中央精神文明建设指导委员会

zh-cn: 中央精神文明建设指导委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的议事协调机构，主管全国意识形态工作。
description.en: A deliberative and coordinating body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, in charge of national ideological work.

nodes.id: 第29届奥林匹克运动会组织委员会

zh-cn: 第29届奥林匹克运动会组织委员会

description.zh-cn: 负责2008年北京夏季奥林匹克运动会筹备和组织工作的机构。
description.en: The organization responsible for the preparation and organization of the 2008 Beijing Summer Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 第29届夏季奥林匹克运动会，在中国北京举办。
description.en: The 29th Summer Olympic Games, held in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 负责管理奥林匹克运动的国际性非政府组织。
description.en: An international non-governmental organization responsible for administering the Olympic Movement.

nodes.id: 首都各界庆祝中华人民共和国成立60周年大会

zh-cn: 首都各界庆祝中华人民共和国成立60周年大会

description.zh-cn: 为庆祝中华人民共和国成立60周年在北京举行的大型活动，由时任北京市委书记刘淇主持。
description.en: A large-scale event held in Beijing to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China, presided over by then-Beijing Party Secretary Liu Qi.

description.zh-cn: 1998年由时任国务院总理朱镕基主持的政府机构改革，旨在精简机构、转变政府职能。
description.en: The 1998 government institutional reform presided over by then-Premier Zhu Rongji, aimed at streamlining organizations and transforming government functions.

description.zh-cn: 江苏省常州市下辖区，刘淇的出生地。
description.en: A district under the jurisdiction of Changzhou City, Jiangsu Province, and the birthplace of Liu Qi.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的第十四届中央领导机构。
description.en: The 14th central leading body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十五届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十五届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的第十五届中央领导机构。
description.en: The 15th central leading body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的第十六届中央领导机构。
description.en: The 16th central leading body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的第十七届中央领导机构。
description.en: The 17th central leading body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘淇于1942年11月出生于江苏省武进县。
description.en: Liu Qi was born in Wujin County, Jiangsu Province in November 1942.

description.zh-cn: 刘淇于1959年从北京101中学毕业。
description.en: Liu Qi graduated from Beijing 101 Middle School in 1959.

description.zh-cn: 刘淇1959年考入北京钢铁学院（现北京科技大学），1964年本科毕业后继续攻读研究生，并于1968年获研究生学历。
description.en: Liu Qi was admitted to the Beijing Institute of Iron and Steel Technology (now University of Science and Technology Beijing) in 1959, continued postgraduate studies after graduating in 1964, and obtained his postgraduate degree in 1968.

description.zh-cn: 刘淇于1975年9月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Liu Qi joined the Communist Party of China in September 1975.

description.zh-cn: 刘淇自1968年起在武汉钢铁公司工作，于1990年至1993年担任公司经理。
description.en: Liu Qi worked at Wuhan Iron and Steel Corporation from 1968, serving as its manager from 1990 to 1993.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部

description.zh-cn: 1993年3月至1998年3月，刘淇担任中华人民共和国冶金工业部部长。
description.en: From March 1993 to March 1998, Liu Qi served as the Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1999年2月10日至2003年1月19日，刘淇担任北京市市长。
description.en: From February 10, 1999, to January 19, 2003, Liu Qi served as the Mayor of Beijing.

relationships.target: 中国共产党北京市委员会

description.zh-cn: 2002年10月22日至2012年7月3日，刘淇担任中共北京市委书记。
description.en: From October 22, 2002, to July 3, 2012, Liu Qi served as the Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 刘淇是中共第十六届、十七届中央政治局委员。
description.en: Liu Qi was a member of the 16th and 17th Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 第29届奥林匹克运动会组织委员会

description.zh-cn: 2001年12月至2009年8月，刘淇担任北京奥运会组委会主席。
description.en: From December 2001 to August 2009, Liu Qi served as the President of the Beijing Organising Committee for the Olympic Games.

relationships.target: 中央精神文明建设指导委员会

description.zh-cn: 2012年7月起，刘淇担任中央文明委副主任，直至2013年1月。
description.en: Starting from July 2012, Liu Qi served as the Vice Chairman of the Central Guidance Commission on Building Spiritual Civilization until January 2013.

description.zh-cn: 刘淇接替戚元靖出任中华人民共和国冶金工业部部长。
description.en: Liu Qi succeeded Qi Yuanjing as the Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘淇接替贾庆林出任北京市市长。
description.en: Liu Qi succeeded Jia Qinglin as the Mayor of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 孟学农接替刘淇出任北京市市长。
description.en: Meng Xuenong succeeded Liu Qi as the Mayor of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 刘淇接替贾庆林出任中共北京市委书记。
description.en: Liu Qi succeeded Jia Qinglin as the Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 郭金龙接替刘淇出任中共北京市委书记。
description.en: Guo Jinlong succeeded Liu Qi as the Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1998年，时任国务院总理朱镕基主持了国务院机构改革。
description.en: In 1998, then-Premier Zhu Rongji presided over the institutional reform of the State Council.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部

description.zh-cn: 在1998年的国务院机构改革中，冶金工业部被撤销。
description.en: The Ministry of Metallurgical Industry was abolished during the 1998 institutional reform of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 作为北京奥运会组委会主席，刘淇领导了2008年夏季奥林匹克运动会的筹备与举办工作。
description.en: As the President of the Beijing Organising Committee for the Olympic Games, Liu Qi led the preparation and hosting of the 2008 Summer Olympics.

relationships.source: 第29届奥林匹克运动会组织委员会

description.zh-cn: 北京奥运会组委会负责2008年夏季奥林匹克运动会的组织和举办。
description.en: The Beijing Organising Committee for the Olympic Games was responsible for organizing and hosting the 2008 Summer Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 2008年8月25日，国际奥委会主席雅克·罗格向刘淇颁授奥林匹克金质勋章。
description.en: On August 25, 2008, IOC President Jacques Rogge awarded the Olympic Order in Gold to Liu Qi.

relationships.target: 首都各界庆祝中华人民共和国成立60周年大会

description.zh-cn: 2009年，刘淇主持了首都各界庆祝中华人民共和国成立60周年大会。
description.en: In 2009, Liu Qi presided over the celebrations for the 60th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China in the capital.
